speaker: MENENIUS
text: See you yond coign o’ th’ Capitol, yond

speaker: MENENIUS
text: cornerstone?

speaker: SICINIUS
text: Why, what of that?

speaker: MENENIUS
text: If it be possible for you to displace it with

speaker: MENENIUS
text: your little finger, there is some hope the ladies of

speaker: MENENIUS
text: Rome, especially his mother, may prevail with

speaker: MENENIUS
text: him. But I say there is no hope in ’t. Our throats

speaker: MENENIUS
text: are sentenced and stay upon execution.

speaker: SICINIUS
text: Is ’t possible that so short a time can alter the

speaker: SICINIUS
text: condition of a man?

speaker: MENENIUS
text: There is differency between a grub and a

speaker: MENENIUS
text: butterfly, yet your butterfly was a grub. This Martius

speaker: MENENIUS
text: is grown from man to dragon. He has wings;

speaker: MENENIUS
text: he’s more than a creeping thing.

speaker: SICINIUS
text: He loved his mother dearly.

speaker: MENENIUS
text: So did he me; and he no more remembers

speaker: MENENIUS
text: his mother now than an eight-year-old horse. The

speaker: MENENIUS
text: tartness of his face sours ripe grapes. When he

speaker: MENENIUS
text: walks, he moves like an engine, and the ground

speaker: MENENIUS
text: shrinks before his treading. He is able to pierce a

speaker: MENENIUS
text: corslet with his eye, talks like a knell, and his hum

speaker: MENENIUS
text: is a battery. He sits in his state as a thing made for

speaker: MENENIUS
text: Alexander. What he bids be done is finished with

speaker: MENENIUS
text: his bidding. He wants nothing of a god but eternity

speaker: MENENIUS
text: and a heaven to throne in.

speaker: SICINIUS
text: Yes, mercy, if you report him truly.

speaker: MENENIUS
text: I paint him in the character. Mark what

speaker: MENENIUS
text: mercy his mother shall bring from him. There is

speaker: MENENIUS
text: no more mercy in him than there is milk in a male

speaker: MENENIUS
text: tiger. That shall our poor city find, and all this is

speaker: MENENIUS
text: long of you.

speaker: SICINIUS
text: The gods be good unto us.

speaker: MENENIUS
text: No, in such a case the gods will not be good

speaker: MENENIUS
text: unto us. When we banished him, we respected not

speaker: MENENIUS
text: them; and he returning to break our necks, they

speaker: MENENIUS
text: respect not us.

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
Sir
              ,
               
              if
               
              you’d
               
              save
               
              your
               
              life
              ,
               
              fly
               
              to
               
              your
               
              house
              .

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
The
               
              plebeians
               
              have
               
              got
               
              your
               
              fellow
               
              tribune

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
And
               
              hale
               
              him
               
              up
               
              and
               
              down
              ,
               
              all
               
              swearing
               
              if

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
The
               
              Roman
               
              ladies
               
              bring
               
              not
               
              comfort
               
              home
              ,

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
They’ll
               
              give
               
              him
               
              death
               
              by
               
              inches
              .

speaker: SICINIUS
text:
What’s
               
              the
               
              news
              ?

speaker:
SECOND
               
              MESSENGER
text:
Good
               
              news
              ,
               
              good
               
              news
              !
               
              The
               
              ladies
               
              have
               
              prevailed
              .

speaker:
SECOND
               
              MESSENGER
text:
The
               
              Volscians
               
              are
               
              dislodged
               
              and
               
              Martius
               
              gone
              .

speaker:
SECOND
               
              MESSENGER
text:
A
               
              merrier
               
              day
               
              did
               
              never
               
              yet
               
              greet
               
              Rome
              ,

speaker:
SECOND
               
              MESSENGER
text:
No
              ,
               
              not
               
              th’
               
              expulsion
               
              of
               
              the
               
              Tarquins
              .

speaker: SICINIUS
text:
Friend
              ,

speaker: SICINIUS
text:
Art
               
              thou
               
              certain
               
              this
               
              is
               
              true
              ?
               
              Is
               
              ’t
               
              most
               
              certain
              ?

speaker:
SECOND
               
              MESSENGER
text:
As
               
              certain
               
              as
               
              I
               
              know
               
              the
               
              sun
               
              is
               
              fire
              .

speaker:
SECOND
               
              MESSENGER
text:
Where
               
              have
               
              you
               
              lurked
               
              that
               
              you
               
              make
               
              doubt
               
              of
               
              it
              ?

speaker:
SECOND
               
              MESSENGER
text:
Ne’er
               
              through
               
              an
               
              arch
               
              so
               
              hurried
               
              the
               
              blown
               
              tide

speaker:
SECOND
               
              MESSENGER
text:
As
               
              the
               
              recomforted
               
              through
               
              th’
               
              gates
              .
               
              Why
              ,
               
              hark
               
              you
              !

SECOND
               
              MESSENGER
text:
The
               
              trumpets
              ,
               
              sackbuts
              ,
               
              psalteries
              ,
               
              and
               
              fifes
              ,

speaker:
SECOND

text:
Tabors
               
              and
               
              cymbals
              ,

              the
               
              shouting
               
              Romans

speaker:
SECOND
               
              MESSENGER
text:
Make
               
              the
               
              sun
               
              dance
              .
               
              Hark
               
              you
              !

speaker: MENENIUS
text:
This
               
              is
               
              good
               
              news
              .

speaker: MENENIUS
text:
I
               
              will
               
              go
               
              meet
               
              the
               
              ladies
              .
               
              This
               
              Volumnia

speaker: MENENIUS
text:
Is
               
              worth
               
              of
               
              consuls
              ,

              ,

speaker: MENENIUS
text:
A
               
              city
               
              full
              ;
               
              of
               
              tribunes
               
              such
               
              as
               
              you

speaker: MENENIUS
text:
A
               
              sea
               
              and
               
              land
               
              full
              .
               
              You
               
              have
               
              prayed
               
              well
               
              today
              .

speaker: MENENIUS
text:
This
               
              morning
               
              for
               
              ten
               
              thousand
               
              of
               
              your
               
              throats

speaker: MENENIUS
text:
I’d
               
              not
               
              have
               
              given
               
              a
               
              doit
              .
               
              Hark
              ,
               
              how
               
              they
               
              joy
              !

speaker: SICINIUS
text: First, the gods bless

speaker: SICINIUS
text: you for your tidings; next, accept my thankfulness.

speaker:
SECOND
               
              MESSENGER
text:
Sir
              ,
               
              we
               
              have
               
              all
               
              great
               
              cause
               
              to
               
              give
               
              great
               
              thanks
              .

speaker: SICINIUS
text: They are near the city?

speaker:
SECOND
               
              MESSENGER
text: Almost at point to enter.

speaker: SICINIUS
text: We’ll meet them, and help the joy.
